title: "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"
body: everytime i try to open league a popup almost emidiatly shows saying; "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working": it shows up everytime i try to open the launcher, i have no leads on what to do. can anyone help me?

replies.body:
A lot of times when you see Patcher Kernel errors, it's a result of League not having proper System Permissions. Since League interacts with a lot of system files outside of the League directory, it's likely to encounter issues when it does not have access to those files. You can find the most common fixes in our [Permissions Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if this helped.
im now running this as administrater and it looks like its working, but is there a way to run it without running as admin or does that fix it?
